title: help
body: after the beta upgrade i can't open the game. Like after i press launch i have a black screen

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this, and it's something our client devs are also investigating.  I can't make any guarantees on a fix right now, but I'd certianly like to help troubleshoot.  If your screen is completely blacked (not dimmed), then there could be a permissions problem failing to access your game files properly.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to see if that can help fix the problem.  Let me know what you find!
